item.title:
RT by @fuzzland_: It's tragedy for safe being compromised and thus harmed bybit ğŸ˜¢. Lesson here is NEVER TRUST.
The principle of this theory is validating everything on your own. 3-step checks are necessary:
1. Simulate to check the transaction outcome, Safe already integrated Tenderly so it's just one-click.
2. Cross-check pre-sign data on website and wallet extension. Rabby/MetaMask displays the data in a clean way. To, value, data, operation are the critical field you will be checking at.
3. Cross-check pre-sign data on wallet and hardware wallet. Match every critical field before you sign. Kudos to OneKey team!
item.dc:creator: @tonykebot
item.description:
It's tragedy for safe being compromised and thus harmed bybit ğŸ˜¢. Lesson here is NEVER TRUST.

The principle of this theory is validating everything on your own. 3-step checks are necessary:

1. Simulate to check the transaction outcome, Safe already integrated Tenderly so it's just one-click.

2. Cross-check pre-sign data on website and wallet extension. Rabby/MetaMask displays the data in a clean way. To, value, data, operation are the critical field you will be checking at.

3. Cross-check pre-sign data on wallet and hardware wallet. Match every critical field before you sign. Kudos to OneKey team!
